summary:
This mod brings you a retextured (non-replacer) Daedric armor.
Ever felt like Daedric armor was too dark and didn\'t feel as Oblivious
as it used too? Then this mod might be for you.
descriptionHtml:
[h1]NEWS FLASH: I\'ll be on a skieing trip from February 15th till February 24th![/h1]

[b]NOTE: This mod was on request.[/b]

This mod brings you a retextured (non-replacer) Daedric armor.
Ever felt like Daedric armor was too dark and didn\'t feel as Oblivious
as it used too? Then this mod might be for you.

[b]EDIT: This is now a replacer![/b]

Don\'t worry about retrieving the armor, it will be added to your
inventory up on game launch.

[b]INCLUDES:[/b]
Boots
Gauntlets
Cuirass
Helmet
Shield

[b]IN OTHER NEWS[/b]
This is just a small mod request I have gotten form one of you guys.
Feel free to subscribe.

If this is not really your thing, perhaps you\'d like to check out my 
main projects which are far more immersive:

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=118250193]A Blood Benders Mind[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=123027495]A Keen Markmans Mind[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=124113739]A Dark Alchemists Mind[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=124781214]A True Hunters Mind[/url]

[b]CHANGELOG[/b]
V1.0:
* Release

V1.2:
* Added replacement
* Added crafting and temper data
author: Dyramisty
